item.title: Top Scientists Find Growing Evidence That Greenhouse Gases Are, in Fact, a Danger
item.description: The assessment contradicts the Trump administration’s legal arguments for relaxing pollution rules.

item.title: Live Updates: King Charles Emphasizes Historic Ties With U.S. at State Dinner
item.description: “Our people have fought and died together for the values we hold dear,” the king said, as he welcomed President Trump to a lavish dinner at Windsor Ca...

item.title: Windsor Castle’s State Dinner Features Lavish Menu
item.description: Just over 100 staff members served 160 guests at the white-tie event.

item.title: Europe’s far-right and Charlie Kirk
item.description: The continent’s far right is claiming the activist as a martyr. Our colleague Jason Horowitz explains why.

item.title: Here’s the menu for the state dinner at Windsor Castle.
